Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp21.domain.actor

Class Actor

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp21.domain.actor.Actor
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Player
public abstract class Actor
extends java.lang.Object
Actor is the abstract class that movable actors in the levels will inherit. Note: Actor is part of the domain. I understand this is not exactly what is anticipated but spoke with Jens and he said it was fine as long as sub-actors where loaded by the Persistence for plugin features. See Persistency/levels/level2.jar for plugin features.
